mainContent.headerText: Where are you importing your plant, plant product or seeds to?
mainContent.searchText1: Enter the scientific name or any synonyms or common names of the pest or disease.  Wait for the drop-down list to appear, then select the correct pest or disease from the drop-down.
mainContent.searchText2: Only non-native pests and diseases that are a risk to Great Britain are included in this service.

supportUrl.text: If you have any queries or you need technical support, email

getHelpSection.betabannertext1: This is a new service - your
getHelpSection.betabannertext2: will help us to improve it.

serviceUnavailablePage.description: You cannot currently use this service to lookup pests or diseases. We will add this information soon

errors.purposeOfVisitErrorListText: Select what you want to find out
